agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent associated with the call leg.

available_via.description: The communication channel through which the call leg is available.

call_charge.description: The charge incurred for the call leg.

call_id.description: The unique identifier of the call that the call leg belongs to.

completion_status.description: The status indicating whether the call leg has been completed or not.

conference_from.description: The party initiating the conference call.

conference_time.description: The time when the call enters a conference.

conference_to.description: The party being added to the conference call.

consultation_from.description: The party initiating the consultation call.

consultation_time.description: The time when the call enters a consultation.

consultation_to.description: The party being consulted during the call.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the call leg was created.

duration.description: The length of the call leg in seconds.

forwarded_to.description: The party to whom the call was forwarded.

hold_time.description: The duration for which the call leg was on hold.

id.description: The unique identifier of the call leg.

minutes_billed.description: The minutes for which the call leg is billed.

quality_issues.description: Any reported quality issues during the call leg.

talk_time.description: The actual time spent talking during the call leg.

transferred_from.description: The party from which the call was originally transferred.

transferred_to.description: The party to whom the call was transferred.

type.description: The type of call leg (e.g., inbound, outbound, internal).

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the call leg was last updated.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with the call leg.

wrap_up_time.description: The time taken for wrap-up activities after the call leg ends.
